price: ከአላህም ጋር ሌላን አምላክ ለእርሱ በእርሱ ማስረጃ የሌለው (መሆኑ እየታወቀ) የሚገዛ ሰው ምርመራው እጌታው ዘንድ ብቻ ነው፡፡ እነሆ ከሓዲዎች አይድኑም፡፡
arabic: وَمَن يَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā bur'hāna lahu bihi fa-innamā ḥisābuhu ʿinda rabbihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-kāfirūna
